hero.sub: 6+ years building Shopify stores, custom integrations and scaling ecommerce brands worldwide. Full-stack development + paid ads management.

about.title: About
about.headline: Hi, I'm Andre Almeida
about.role: Shopify Expert Developer & Ecommerce Growth Specialist
about.bio1: My journey in e-commerce started over 6 years ago when I built my first Shopify store and realized the transformative potential of online commerce for entrepreneurs worldwide.
about.bio2: Since then, I've delivered 100+ projects across 15+ countries, including Brazil (especially Greater SÃ£o Paulo), the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia.
about.bio3: What started as a solo developer passionate about e-commerce has evolved into a specialized team in rapid expansion. Today, our team brings together full-stack developers, creative designers, paid traffic specialists, and CRO strategists.
about.bio4: We don't just create stores. Our mission is to build complete e-commerce systems that transform entrepreneurial visions into profitable and scalable businesses.
about.transparencyD: You'll always know what we're doing and why
about.partnershipD: We're invested in your sustainable growth
